page.title: 10Size of Families
page.content: We carried out a survey in our school to find out how big families are in this area. All the children had one mum, some had two because their dad had remarried and they lived with him. The children had from 1 to 4 fathers. Most of them only had one or two dads, that had lived with them since they were born. The average size of a family is 6 including mum and dad. Some children came from big families, one family had 11 members. Other families are small ,only 3 members.Some children had other people living in their homes, like nans, uncles and aunties, and friends of the family.
